meanings.definition: A group of people living in the same place or having a particular characteristic in common.
meanings.sent1: In small towns, tight-knit communities often help each other out.
meanings.sent2: Many online communities exist where people share their hobbies and interests.
meanings.sent3: The community picnic turned into a water balloon fight, creating laughter and fun.
meanings.sent4: The community of ants worked together to build an intricate underground network.
meanings.sent5: The sense of belonging in a community can provide comfort and support during tough times.

meanings.definition: A feeling of fellowship with others, as a result of sharing common attitudes, interests, and goals.
meanings.sent1: Volunteering at the local shelter fosters a sense of community and togetherness.
meanings.sent2: The sense of community among classmates made group projects enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The community of book lovers gathered weekly to discuss their favorite reads.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, the team spirit creates a strong sense of community.
meanings.sent5: The shared passion for music united the diverse group into a tight-knit community.
